reviewText:
This is the last of the 3 episode releases (6 per DVD starting next year). For most of Cases (seasons)4 and 5, I've liked 2 of the stories and the other was just okay. But on "Covering Up" all 3 are quite good. "Dead Hobo" is a nice change of pace and my favorite of these.

Together with "Phantom Thief", this is the best of Case 5.
